title: Workshop on Gamification-Based Science Education Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design theories and gamification concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening customized science education simulation development competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can develop a design framework for integrating gamification elements into science education simulations.
Learners can improve gamification solutions through at least three rapid prototyping processes in a VR-based environment.
Learners can submit final outputs that meet project-based assessment criteria by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
